trends: There have been 19 other sightings in Niagara Falls
There were no other sightings in Niagara Falls on or around April 6th 2008
divs: Sighting DetailsWhile driving south on Military Road, I saw an object in the corner of my eye. It had shimmering lights and was cigar shaped.
Summary: 4 bands of multi-colored lights. The colors were red, green, yellow, white and were shimmering.
